name: create_line_chart
description: Generate a customizable line chart from direct data or a file (CSV, Excel, JSON, JSONL). Supports flexible x/y-axis sources, styles, and image export.

x_data.description: List of numeric values for the x-axis (used if file_path is not provided)

y_data.description: List of numeric values for the y-axis (used if file_path is not provided)

file_path.description: Optional path to a .csv, .xlsx, .json, or .jsonl file to load data from

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (used only for Excel files)

x_source.description: Column name or row index to be used as x-axis from file

y_source.description: Column name or row index to be used as y-axis from file

marker.description: Marker style for points on the line

save_path.description: Where to save the output chart image
